name: Bike BMX Racing
description:
Get your ride and join the exciting bike racing game. You have to ride a bike on the construction site. Many obstacles, punchy engine and realistic physics engine make it easy to learn but hard to master. Earn coins by passing levels and buy better bikes.

Features:
* insane actions and stunts. You can perform flips, jumps and burn tires
* many difficult levels
* and hours of fun

Let's see if you are the best rider.
